description: Passionate Life Secrets is designed to help figure out what your passions are and give you practical tools or living a more passionate life. Using "The Passion Test"process created by NY Times bestselling authors, Janet Bray Attwood and Chris Attwood, you'll quickly discover your top 5 passions in life and learn how to align your life with these passions and your life purpose. This course includes video lessons, a PDF workbook, recorded teleclasses and a personal 1-on-1 "Passion Test" session by telephone with a Certified Passion Test Facilitator. This course will take between 1 week and 6 weeks to complete.
title: Passionate Life Secrets: Discover Your Passions and Purpose
instructors: Janet Bray Attwood and Chris Attwood
